mapper.select: select SMALL_CODE as SMALL_CODE1, FULL_NAME as FULL_NAME1 FROM SN_CODE where LARGE_CODE = 'S' and MID_CODE = 'SF007' and nvl(USE_YN,'N') = 'Y' order by SORT_SEQ, SMALL_CODE

SELECT a.FOOD_GRP_CD, a.FOOD_CD, a.FOOD_TYPE, a.FOOD_NM, a.NOTES, 0 as checkDiv FROM SN_FOOD a
where 1=1
AND a.FOOD_GRP_CD = #{foodGrpCd}
AND a.FOOD_CD LIKE '%'||#{foodCd}||'%'
AND a.FOOD_NM LIKE '%'||#{foodNm}||'%'
GROUP BY a.FOOD_GRP_CD, a.FOOD_CD, a.FOOD_TYPE, a.FOOD_NM, a.NOTES ORDER BY a.FOOD_CD
select a.FOOD_CD, a.INGRED_CD, b.INGRED_NM, a.QTY, b.UNIT, a.MAINMENU_YN from SN_FOOD_DTL a, SN_INGRED b where b.INGRED_CD = a.INGRED_CD and a.FOOD_CD = #{foodCd}
mapper.update:
update SN_FOOD set FOOD_GRP_CD=#{foodGrpCd}, FOOD_CD=#{foodCd}, FOOD_TYPE=#{foodType}, FOOD_NM=#{foodNm}, NOTES=#{notes}
where FOOD_CD=#{foodCd}

update SN_FOOD_DTL set FOOD_CD=#{foodCd}, INGRED_CD=#{ingredCd}, AMOUNT=#{amount}, MAINMENU_YN=#{mainmenuYn}, QTY=#{qty}
where FOOD_CD=#{foodCd}
